name: Milo & Me
description:
***DEVICE REQUIREMENTS***
- This game is currently only supported on these devices:

iPad 2
iPad 3rd and 4th Generation
iPad Air
iPad mini 1st and 2nd Generation
iPhone 5
iPhone 5c
iPhone 5s
- The game may play on other devices but is not recommended due to memory requirements.

** WINNER: GameSalad's Game of the Month: June **

"Wow this game is absolutely terrific. It is a game that is just dripping with charm and personality at every corner. The atmosphere is wonderful with its spooky art style, environments, characters, and sounds all immerse you into one great adventure." - TouchArcade Forums

Milo needs your help. Would you be so kind to help find his dog Cody?

Milo & Me is an action-adventure game where you use your slimy digits to lead Milo, attack, collect, and solve puzzles. Careful though-your fingers are in the game...so don't get hurt!
Guide Milo through bizarre worlds and help him take on monsters that inhabit this mysterious place you've found yourself. Only you can reunite Milo and his best friend!

GAME FEATURES:
- Fun and intuitive multi-touch controls (no flimsy virtual d-pads here!).
- Unlock the secrets of a mysterious world as you guide Milo to find his dog Cody.
- Flick, drag, tap, and pinch your way through puzzles and dangerous enemies.
- Collect pretty items across various creepy-cute areas.
- Spend Pearls and Beetles to upgrade Milo's abilities.
- Find and activate power-ups to give Milo boosts.

CHAPTER ONE
- This version of the app contains Chapter One of the game (about 2 hours of gameplay)
- Future chapters will be available as FREE updates when they are ready.
- Chapter Two coming soon!

View more screenshots and watch gameplay videos on Facebook: www.facebook.com/milonme

A game by Jason Nowak
